name: Saving The Cousins
description:
Saving the Cousins is a math game for young learners Grades 1-2. Learning focuses on currency (identifying and counting coins), telling time (whole, half and quarter hours), and an introduction of fractions (halves, thirds and quarters). The theme of the game is to buy enough fruits and vegetables to free six cousins from a haunted house.  Graphics are kid-friendly.

This game was made in RPG Maker MZ using mostly RTP assets.
